name: Eier
description:
A 2D turn­-based strategy/visual novel game where the player takes on the role as a new student of a Magic Academy. The player learns how to summon minions to fight alongside him to save his friend (Viktor) from the Headmaster. Inspired by Grim Grimoire.

This project was made as part of our Final Year Project.

Disclaimer: We do not claim ownership over any of the art assets presented in the game. All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
